title: It's Hard to Tell Where The Irony Ends
description: A group of darbs went see the new minions movie in yellow ponchos as an extremely low budget minion costume.

title: Darb Talks
description: During Darb Talks darbs present on whatever they desire. Usually they're quite "enlightening"...

title: Halloween Pumpkin Drop
description: Every year on Halloween night Dabney drops frozen pumpkins off of the tallest building on campus.

title: Sometimes Events Just Create Themselves
description: Our social events are scheduled at the start of each term (see the social calender), but sometimes random events emerge from the chaos that is Dabney Hovse...
